cover.title: Add to Cart
cover.description: Microsoft 365, the subscription-based version of Microsoft's familiar Office app package that includes programs like Word and PowerPoint, is getting a very 21st-century power boost, Microsoft announced. It's bolting its own AI chatbot system Copilot into the subscriber package for many customers.

footer.title: Interesting Stories | Updates | Guides
footer.description: Subscribe to learn about new technology and updates. Join over 5000+ members community to stay up to date with latest news.
